title: Topic 001 Question 030
body: A company migrated their entire data/center to Google Cloud Platform. It is running thousands of instances across multiple projects managed by different departments. You want to have a historical record of what was running in Google Cloud Platform at any point in time.
options: Use Resource Manager on the organization level.
Use Forseti Security to automate inventory snapshots.
Use Stackdriver to create a dashboard across all projects.
Use Security Command Center to view all assets across the organization.
